Morbius is a new sort-of MCU superhero origin movie from Sony, in which Doctor Michael Morbius played by Jared Leto transforms into Morbius. The movie did break all kinds of box office records and sold over 300 morbillion tickets, but the reception wasn't so great. The entire internet was mostly making fun of and memeing Morbius. So in today's Anatomy of a Failure, let's see what Morbius did and didn't do in order to become an easy target online. Let's see why Morbius is a bad movie and how it can avoid the same fate in the sequel.

Morbius (2022)
While attempting to find a cure for his terminal disease, Dr. Michael Morbius stumbles upon an experimental procedure that may improve his aliment. Although initially considered a success, Dr. Morbius starts to feel a darkness awaken inside of him. The Marvel Comic of the same name inspires this anti-hero's journey. One of the most compelling and conflicted characters in Sony Pictures Universe of Marvel Characters comes to the big screen as Oscar® winner Jared Leto transforms into the enigmatic antihero Michael Morbius. Dangerously ill with a rare blood disorder and determined to save others suffering his same fate, Dr. Morbius attempts a desperate gamble.
